title: Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program for Online Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in designing and operating medical knowledge acquisition curricula for mobile environments among practicing professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain technical tool utilization methods required for online medical education design.
Learners can propose educational effectiveness measurement plans using mixed research methods (quantitative + qualitative).
Learners can produce mobile microlearning content under limited time/budget constraints.
Learners develop strategies to address key issues (e.g., accessibility, reduced interaction) that may arise in online medical education courses.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
